title: Locked Screen Problem
body: I have a problem with my screen. While its locked it doesn't keep up with my character and keep jittering, since I've only ever played locked this makes it unplayable for me, please help. My FPS and Ping are fine and I've tried capping my FPS lower and everything.. Please help.

replies.body:
Hmmm, this may be caused by a feature called *Movement Prediction*. I recommend hopping into your in-game settings and ensure it's disabled under your **Game** settings, as shown below:

https://imgur.com/a/OSXlP

Let me know if this helped.
